title: Color, antioxidant and nutritional composition of dehydrated country bean (Lablab purpureus) seeds using solar drying techniques and pretreatments in Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Maksuratun Nahar Suborna, Jahidul Hassan, M. Mizanur Rahman, Mohammad Sharif Raihan, Joydeb Gomasta, Minhaz Ahmed, Md. Mamunur Rahman, Yukio Ozaki, Md. Zubayer, Saud Alamri
